parameters.name: DateFrom
parameters.description:
Beginning of the range for absence date. The `DateFrom` parameter
determines date to get absence data from, as well as the school year period

parameters.name: DateTo
parameters.description:
End of the range for absence date.
The `DateTo` parameter must be within the same school year as `DateFrom`

parameters.name: OnlyAbsenceReports
parameters.description:
Only retrieve reports of absence or partial absence,
defaults to false (retrieve everything)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of objects per page.

parameters.name: InlineCount
parameters.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

parameters.name: SchoolCode
parameters.description: The school code for which to get data.

This parameter is required

parameters.name: LmsIndicator

If not specified, then the value of the LMS indicator is disregarded in the filtering.

parameters.name: SchoolCode

parameters.name: PeriodFrom
parameters.description:
Beginning of period for activity report quarters.
The `PeriodFrom` parameter must be a date that is on or before given activity report period
to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. if specifying PeriodFrom as 2021-01-01 and PeriodTo as 2021-06-30
you will only get the activity report for 2nd period of 2021 (March 16 to June 15)

parameters.name: PeriodTo
parameters.description:
End of period for activity report quarters. The `PeriodTo` parameter must fully encompass
the end date of a given activity report quarter to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. to get all activity reports for 2020 the PeriodFrom could be 2019-12-15
and PeriodTo could be 2020-12-30

parameters.name: SchoolCode
parameters.description: The school code for which to get data.

parameters.name: PeriodFrom
parameters.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no earlier than `PeriodFrom`

parameters.name: PeriodTo
parameters.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no later than `PeriodFromTo`

GroupsExternalRequest.title: GroupsExternalRequest
GroupsExternalRequest.description:
The request for retrieving groups
The parameters for the request can be a combination of each of the individual properties
which will each further narrow the requested data.
At least one parameter has to be specified

groupsActiveOnOrAfterDate.description: Groups must be active on or after this date

groupEntityTypes.description:
An array of group types (Group Entity Type) to query for
<example>
0 = SubjectCourse
</example>

groupIds.description:
Optional array of groups to read.
Must contain 1 to 1000 elements

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

groupEntityType.title: GroupEntityType
groupEntityType.description:
Type of entity that this group refers to
e.g. a subject course or an educational programme

groupEntityId.title: Guid
groupEntityId.description: Id of the root entity that this group belongs to (owner)

rootGroupId.title: Guid
rootGroupId.description: Id of the root group in this hierarchy

parentGroupId.description:
The parent group, if any. Only the top
level groups will not have a parent id.

displayName.title: String
displayName.description:
The group's display name.
The name is a combination of the entity type's name and name of the group

designation.title: String
designation.description:
The group's designation.
The designation is a combination of the entity type's designation and name of the group

startDate.title: Date
startDate.description: The start date of the group.

endDate.title: Date
endDate.description: The end date of the group.

numberOfSessions.description: The number of sessions defined for this group.

lmsIndicator.title: Boolean
lmsIndicator.description: Is the entity to be created in the LMS.

participationPeriods.description: Array of participants in this group

deletedAt.description: If the group has been deleted, this property will have a value

updatedAt.description: Last update of the group's basic information

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

externalLessonId.title: String
externalLessonId.description: External identifier set by partners to allow them to match it with the lessons known by them.

subjectCourseId.title: Guid
subjectCourseId.description: Reference to the subject course that lesson is part of.

subjectCourseIds.description:
The ids of the subject courses which are associated with this session. If the type
is None then this value is empty.

roomId.description:
Obsolete!
Reference to the room where lesson is conducted.
Use RoomIds instead of RoomId. RoomId will be removed in a future update.

roomIds.description: The ids of the rooms where the lesson is conducted.

startTime.description:
Start time of the lesson.
This property is filled if the lesson is using a user defined schedule

endTime.description:
End time of the lesson.
This property is filled if the lesson is using a user defined schedule

schoolHourEntryId.description:
If the lesson is planned using the school hours time table, the SchoolHourEntryId will be populated.
If the lesson otherwise is using custom start and end time, the SchoolHourEntryId will be null (this is the default of most of the partnering time table systems)

The type of the level.
TEGN = Characters, TAL = Numbers,
ERHVERV, FGU almen, FGU-tema, Delml.

absenceRegistrations.description: The absence registrations on the lesson.

studentId.title: Guid
studentId.description: The student to register absence for.

status.title: AbsenceRegistrationStatus
status.description:
Status of the absence registration:
0 = Present
1 = Absent
2 = Partially absent

comment.title: String

sessionEntityType.title: SessionEntityType
sessionEntityType.description: The type of session entity which is associated with this session.

sessionEntityId.description:
The id of the entity which is associated with this session. If the type
is None then this value is null, otherwise it has a value.

If there are more than one related session entity, the first is returned.

sessionEntityIds.description:
The ids of the entities which are associated with this session. If the type
is None then this value is empty.

externalLessonId.title: String
externalLessonId.description: An exsternal id for the session

groupIds.description: Ids of groups related to the session.

roomIds.description: Ids of rooms related to the session.

teacherIds.description: Ids of teachers related to the session.

date.description: The date when the session is held.

startTime.description: The time when the session starts.

endTime.description: The time when the session ends.

schoolHourEntryId.description: The id of the school hour entry which the session is scheduled to.

sessionIds.description: The ids of the sessions to retrieve.

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

groupIds.description: If specified, returns sessions which have at least one of the specific groups.

teacherIds.description: If specified, returns sessions which have at least one of the specific teachers.

roomIds.description: If specified, returns sessions which have at least one of the specific rooms.

dateFrom.description: If specified, returns sessions which are planned on a date no earlier than this.

dateTo.description: If specified, returns sessions which are planned on a date no later than this.

pageNumber.title: Int32
pageNumber.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

inlineCount.title: Boolean
inlineCount.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

StudentActivityReportsExternalRequest.title: StudentActivityReportsExternalRequest
StudentActivityReportsExternalRequest.description: Returns reports containing activities for students

periodFrom.title: Date
periodFrom.description:
Beginning of period for activity report quarters.
The `PeriodFrom` parameter must be a date that is on or before given activity report period
to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. if specifying PeriodFrom as 2021-01-01 and PeriodTo as 2021-06-30
you will only get the activity report for 2nd period of 2021 (March 16 to June 15)

periodTo.title: Date
periodTo.description:
End of period for activity report quarters. The `PeriodTo` parameter must fully encompass
the end date of a given activity report quarter to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. to get all activity reports for 2020 the PeriodFrom could be 2019-12-15
and PeriodTo could be 2020-12-30

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

StudentActivityReportsV2ExternalRequest.title: StudentActivityReportsV2ExternalRequest
StudentActivityReportsV2ExternalRequest.description: Returns V2 activity reports containing activities for students

periodFrom.title: Date
periodFrom.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no earlier than `PeriodFrom`

periodTo.title: Date
periodTo.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no later than `PeriodFromTo`

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

Possible duration of subject in days.

Can be null. In this case look at Programmes.Host.ExternalApi.SubjectCourses.Queries.SubjectCourses.UVMSubjectDetails.DurationInHours

Possible duration of subject in hours.

roomId.description:

Reference to the room where lesson is conducted.
Use RoomIds instead of RoomId. RoomId will be removed in a future update.
